Comments_List: A deeper exploration of political philosophy via the concepts of truth in democracy.
It was engaging and well thought out with a comprehensive syllabus. It was a little tough to concentrate over the 1h50 session. Would be better meeting twice a week.
Yes. If you are interested in political philosophy and have some background knowledge.
